name: minimalPWA
description: Progressive Web Apps m√≠nimo para pruebas de servidor

scripts.build-css-critical: node-sass src/critical.scss src/critical.css; mkdir -p css; uglifycss --output css/critical.min.css src/critical.css; rm -f src/critical.css
scripts.build-css-noncritical: node-sass src/non-critical.scss src/non-critical.css; mkdir -p css; uglifycss --output css/non-critical.min.css src/non-critical.css; rm -f src/non-critical.css
scripts.build-css: npm run build-css-critical; npm run build-css-noncritical
